main.name: Andrey Toderyan
main.description: I am a Software Engineer with a focus on Full Stack development
main.bio: Bachelor of Computer Science graduate at Portland State University with hands-on experience in developing fintech web applications, automation, and satellite image transmission software. Fluent in English, Russian, and Ukrainian, he has interned at Apex Fintech Solutions showcasing proficiency in TypeScript, React, C++, Python, and more, with a passion for both software and web development.
